```{r, echo=F, message=F}
# Loading all necessary libraries
library(tdmore)
library(shinytdmore)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(assertthat)
```

```{r, echo=F}
patient <- getPatient(params$id)
```

## Patient data
Name: `r paste(patient$firstname, patient$lastname)`

### Doses history
```{r, echo=F}
kable(patient$doses)
```

### Measures history
```{r, echo=F}
kable(patient$measures)
```

### Covariates
```{r, echo=F}
kable(patient$covariates)
```
